page.title: 03RECREATION/LEISURE
page.content: In our area we have one of the largest sports centres in Europe,the{Crowtree {Leisure Centre.}Activities take place in its leisure pool,sports hall or ice rink. From our survey most people seem to be satisfied with the provision for leisure activities. Almost{50%}have{15 {to 20}hours a week leisure time and {59%}attend a leisure complex,club or association to carry out their activity. Only{24%}of those questioned are involved in church activities. People in the area will travel for their activities,{50%}said they travelled up to{5 miles.}Also,most said their activities were done as a family. Few however said they attended classes run by the local authority. The most popular activities include a{variety of sports,reading,gardening, {sewing,dancing,rambling,knitting.
